name: CubeX: Classic Block Puzzle
description:
Classic game of puzzle blocks and arcade games! Just enjoy this endless puzzle.

CubeX: Classic Block Puzzle is a relaxing game of ingenuity and cunning in real time, you have to have good reflexes and a good brain to be able to put together a whole line in real time while the blocks are falling at a good speed.

CubeX: Classic Block Puzzle helps to improve the ability to make logical decisions in real time, since you have little time to decide where to best fit the blocks to complete the puzzles that are infinite due to their randomness.

CubeX: Classic Block Puzzle has score and difficulty levels, the more you progress the more difficult the game will become, and the more complex it will be to fit the blocks to be able to progress in your level.

CubeX: Classic Block Puzzle if you like blocks and puzzles this is your game, it's a simple game and the games are very dynamic.
